Query: How to connect to wifi in CentOS 7(CLI)(no GUI)?

Answers.MP Summary: show / manipulate wireless devices and their configuration

ul_400901: Connect to WEP/WPA without nmcli?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_400901: touch /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
echo ctrl_interface=/run/wpa_supplicant > /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
echo update_config=1 >> /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
wpa_passphrase "Your_SSID" Your_PASSWORD >> /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
i=$(iw dev | grep Interface | awk '{ print $2}')
killall wpa_supplicant
wpa_supplicant -i $i -c/etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -B
dhclient $i

i=$(iw dev | grep Interface | awk '{ print $2}')
killall wpa_supplicant
wpa_supplicant -i $i -c/etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -B
dhclient $i

iw dev <interface> connect "Your_SSID" key 0:WEP_KEY

Answers.MP Summary: Wi-Fi Protected Access client and IEEE 802.1X supplicant

Top-3 Scripts:
ul_250562: ##Wireless NIC
allow-hotplug wlan0
iface wlan0 inet manual
wpa-roam /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
iface open_wifi inet dhcp

ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev
update_config=1

##Open_Wifi
network={
    ssid=""
    key_mgmt=NONE
    id_str="open_wifi"
}

wpa_supplicant -d -i wlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -D wext

ul_283722: sudo ip link set wlan0 down
sudo ip link set wlan0 up
sudo wpa_supplicant -B -iwlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf -Dnl80211,wext
sudo dhclient wlan0

wpa_supplicant -B -i wlan0 -c <(wpa_passphrase "Your_SSID" Your_passphrase) && dhclient wlan0

Explanations about Options.-D:
Driver to use (can be multiple drivers: nl80211,wext). (Per interface, see the
 available options below.)
Explanations about Options.-i:
Interface to listen on. Multiple instances of this option can be present, one per
 interface, separated by -N option (see below).
